snippet.title: London's Heathrow Airport unveils new-look Terminal 2
snippet.description:
* The dust sheets were yanked off London Heathrow's gleaming new passenger terminal Wednesday, revealing what its chief architect says is a "cathedral for the 21st century" that'll change air travel for good.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/23/travel/heathrow-terminal-two/index.html

snippet.title: Is Man Utd too big a club to manage?
snippet.description:
* When former Manchester United manager Alex Ferguson steps up to the lectern to deliver the first of his Harvard Business School lectures in May, he won’t be short of material. He knows all about the art of building winning teams, how to deal with the...
http://worldsport.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/23/is-man-utd-too-big-a-club-to-manage/

snippet.title: Michael Porter on GPS: Is the U.S. #1?
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Artificial eyes, plastic skulls: 3-D printing the human body
snippet.description:
* The 21st century has seen the growth of 3-D printing, with well-known applications in architecture, manufacturing, engineering, and now increasingly in medicine.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/17/tech/innovation/artificial-eyes-3d-printing-body/index.html

snippet.title: Does 9/11 museum slander Muslims?
snippet.description:
* (CNN) – Interfaith leaders object to a film slated to be part of an exhibit in theNational September 11 Memorial Museum. "The Rise of Al Qaeda," narrated by NBC's Brian Williams, is supposed to provide a brief history of the terrorist group. The...
http://religion.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/23/does-911-museum-slander-muslims/

snippet.title: How Ukraine crisis could pull U.S. to war
snippet.description:
* Despite the ray of good news in Thursday's Geneva agreement on steps to de-escalate the crisis in Ukraine, President Obama was right to sound a note of caution, observing that "I don't think we can be sure of anything at this point."
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/18/opinion/allison-ukraine-civil-war/index.html

snippet.title: Compare: How London looks on Google vs. paintings from the 1700s
snippet.description:
* Google's Street View images bear some similarities to 18th-century landscape paintings. The content is different, of course. What Google's army of photo collectors captured at Westminster Abbey on any given day in the 21st century will look different than what Italian painter Canaletto saw back ...
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/07/world/europe/london-google-vs-paintings/index.html

snippet.title: Does God have a prayer in Hollywood?
snippet.description:
* By Daniel Burke, CNN Belief Blog Co-Editor Los Angeles (CNN) – Forgive Darren Aronofsky if he’s begun to identify with the title character of his new film, “Noah.” Like the infamous ark-maker, the 45-year-old director has weathered a Bible-sized storm...
http://religion.blogs.cnn.com/2014/03/28/does-god-have-a-prayer-in-hollywood/

snippet.title: Anti-Semitic fliers in eastern Ukraine denounced
snippet.description:
* U.S. officials Thursday denounced what one called a "grotesque" leaflet ordering Jews in one eastern Ukrainian city to register with a government office, but the Jewish community there dismissed it as a "provocation."
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/17/world/ukraine-religious-threats/index.html
